Act Definition.0: An Act to supplement the provisions of the Warehousing Corporations Act, 1962.
Act Definition.1: WHEREAS, in pursuance of clause (1) of article 252 of the Constitution, resolutions have been passed by the Legislatures of certain State to the effect that storage of commodities other than those covered by the Warehousing Corporations Act, 1962 (58 of 1962), in warehouses run by the corporations established under that Act, shall be regulated in those States by Parliament by law.
Act Definition.2: AND WHEREAS, in consequence thereof it is necessary to supplement the provisions of the said Warehousing Corporations Act for the purposes hereinafter appearing;

paragraphs.0: (1) This Act may be called the Warehousing Corporations (Supplementary) Act, 1965.
paragraphs.1: (2) It shall apply to the State specified in the Schedule:
paragraphs.2: Provided that the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, add the name of any other State to the Schedule in respect whereof resolutions have been passed by the Legislatures of those States adopting this Act under clause (1) of article 252 of the Constitution in respect of the storage of commodities other than those covered by the Warehousing Corporations Act, 1962 (58 of 1962), and on the issue of any such notification the States so added shall be deem to be States specified in the Schedule within the meaning of this sub-section.
paragraphs.3: (3) It shall come into force on such date1, as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.

Section 2..heading: Application of the Act with respect to notified commodities.

paragraphs.0: The Warehousing Corporations Act, 1962 (58 of 1962), shall, in its application to the States for the time being specified in the

0.text: Schedule, have effect as if in clause (e) of section 2 of that Act the words and figures “being a commodity with respect to which Parliament has power to make laws by virtue of entry 33 in List III in the Seventh Schedule to Constitution” had been omitted.

contains.2: 1[2. 2[Assam, as it existed immediately before the 21st January, 1972.]]
contains.11: 10[8.] 11[Punjab, as it existed immediately before the 1st day of November, 1966.]
